head: Welcome to the Naughty Secret video chat

nuaghty: On Naughty Secret, men are connected to random women and women are connected to random men!
par: Start a private video chat with a random person in just 10 seconds.Naughty Secret randomly connects men with women and women with men. If you don't like your match, just click “Next” to be connected with a new stranger in a second. Meeting new friends from all over the world has never been easier.
par2: When connecting with random people from all over the world, you might not always speak the same language as your partner. No problem! Our instant translation system automatically translates incoming messages into your language and outgoing messages into your partner's language. You won't even realize that your partner is on the other side of the world.
match: Men are only matched with women
par3: As a man, you have probably already experienced random chat sites where your matches are 90% guys. On Naughty Secret, men only connect with women, and women only with men.
try: Want to give it a try?
selgender: Select your gender, click; start searching;... Thats it! You are in a private live
ranvid: video chat with a random person.
